archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0729
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a simple business customer when I have lodged a change request for my contract, inventory, or services I want to be able to login to my portal and see the status of the request, so that I can plan accordingly

properties.value: status of the request OOTB, change request for my contract to be discussed - if this apply to the agreement modification request?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
